Malice:
Malice chuckled as he stood trapped in a section of corridor.=A0 Lu=
ckily it was a mid sectrion stretch, so no autoguns here.=A0 he continued h=
is search in the terminal to find the captive maximals and sent comm link p=
ings.=A0 They were in maximal encryptions, hoping they'd speak up and tell =
him where they were.=A0 He gave up his terminal search and climbed the wall=
 and crawled into the ventilation system to try to get away from those idio=
ts who couldn't kill him fast enough.

"Yo=
u're not going to no where!!!!" Yelled the Perceptor and then he 
actives a=
 lock down system that blocked all the doors to the main 
corritors"FACE ME=
!!!"

He opened fire against Perceptor

oved deeper into the

<html><head><style type="text/css"><!-- DIV {margin:0px;} --></style></head><body><div style="font-family:times new roman, new york, times, serif;font-size:12pt"><P>Malice:</P>
<P> </P>
<P>Malice chuckled as he stood trapped in a section of corridor.  Luckily it was a mid sectrion stretch, so no autoguns here.  he continued his search in the terminal to find the captive maximals and sent comm link pings.  They were in maximal encryptions, hoping they'd speak up and tell him where they were.  He gave up his terminal search and climbed the wall and crawled into the ventilation system to try to get away from those idiots who couldn't kill him fast enough.</P>
<DIV style="FONT-SIZE: 12pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman, new york, times, serif"><BR><BR>
<DIV style="PADDING-LEFT: 5px; FONT-SIZE: 12pt; MARGIN: 5px 0px 5px 5px; BORDER-LEFT: #1010ff 2px solid; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman, new york, times, serif">----- Original Message ----<BR>From: xochitla2006 <xochitla2006@...><BR>To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com<BR>Sent: Wednesday, May 7, 2008 2:13:21 AM<BR>Subject: Re: Black Fortress<BR><BR>
<DIV id=ygrp-text>
<P>Perceptor:<BR><BR>"You're not going to no where!!!!" Slight sparks flew as his arm bent and fles and <BR>then<BR>> resisted!
